RevisionEvent.Note: Metadata created by OYU and SY

ResourceHeader.Description: SEEDS is a software package to automatically detect, characterize and classify transient/eruptive solar events, including CMEs, using image processing, machine learning and data mining techniques.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: This project has been supported by NASA Living With a Star Program and NASA Applied Information Systems Research Program.

InformationURL.Name: Automatic Detection and Tracking of Coronal Mass Ejections in Coronagraph Time Series
InformationURL.Description: A paper describing the SEEDS CME Catalog by Olmedo, O., Zhang, J., Wechsler, H., Poland, A., Borne, K,

InformationURL.Name: The SEEDS website
InformationURL.Description: A brief description about the SEEDS CME Catalog

Parameter.Name: Start time
Parameter.Description: Start date and time of the detected CME

Parameter.Name: Event Movie
Parameter.Description: A hyperlink pointing to the corresponding event movie; The text indicates Number of Frames containing the event

Parameter.Name: Linear Fit
Parameter.Description: CME Speed obtained from Linear fit to the Height-time with the halfmax-lead values.

Parameter.Name: 2nd Order Fit
Parameter.Description: A CME speed obtained from the 2nd order polynomial fit to the Height-time with the halfmax lead values
